headline: S&P 500 Gains & Losses Today: Markets Surge After US, China Agree to Slash Tariffs
summary: The S&P 500 climbed by 2.8% on Monday, May 12, 2025 as investors reviewed the trade deal between the U.S. and China that significantly reduces tariffs for 90 days as negotiations continue.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Gains & Losses Today: Markets Surge After US, China Agree to Slash Tariffs
raw.summary: The S&P 500 climbed by 2.8% on Monday, May 12, 2025 as investors reviewed the trade deal between the U.S. and China that significantly reduces tariffs for 90 days as negotiations continue.

headline: Stanley Black & Decker Stock Among Biggest S&P 500 Gainers on Tariff Relief
summary: Shares of Stanley Black & Decker surged 16% on Monday, making the stock one of the biggest winners in the S&P 500 amid a broad market rally following news of tariff easing.

raw.headline: Stanley Black & Decker Stock Among Biggest S&P 500 Gainers on Tariff Relief

headline: Why Lowe's, Kohl's, and Stanley Black & Decker Stocks All Popped This Morning
